nodes.text: Galactic Exploitation Technologies was a powerful corporation in 45 ABY, and was led by two Columi brothers, the criminals Marvid and Craitheus Qreph. At that time they tried a hostile takeover of the entire galactic economy.

The corporation normally used criminal methods to achieve their goals, which were primarily mining operations and genetic research. They employed genetically engineered individuals and Mandalorians as mercenaries.
